text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @Mike_Pence #Coronavirus has mutated into two strains, one which appears to be far more aggressive Researchers at #Peking University's School of Life Sciences and the Institut Pasteur of #Shanghai said, in a discovery which could hinder attempts to develop a vaccine. https://t.co/4R0ZRzJK3u
